name: Elasticsearch Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Elasticsearch Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Elasticsearch API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Elasticsearch API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document
available_options: Document (值: document)
Index (值: index)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create)
Delete (值: delete)
Get (值: get)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

indexId.name: indexId
indexId.description: ID of the index to retrieve
indexId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index ID | 作用: ID of the index to retrieve | (必填项)

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.description: ID of the document to update
documentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document ID | 作用: ID of the document to update | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: bulkOperation (值: None) - Whether to use the bulk operation to update the document/s

refresh (值: None) - If true, Elasticsearch refreshes the affected shards to make this operation visible to search,if wait_for then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search,if false do nothing with refreshes

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

paginateNotice.displayName: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.
paginateNotice.name: paginateNotice
paginateNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column
Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}
available_options: fieldValues (值: None)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: allow_no_indices (值: None) - If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or `_all` value. Defaults to true.
expand_wildcards (值: None) - Type of index that wildcard expressions can match. Defaults to `open`
flat_settings (值: None) - Whether to return settings in flat format. Defaults to false.
ignore_unavailable (值: None) - Whether to request that target a missing index return an error. Defaults to false.
include_defaults (值: None) - Whether to return all default settings in the response. Defaults to false.
local (值: None) - Whether to retrieve information from the local node only. Defaults to false.

master_timeout (值: None) - Period to wait for a connection to the master node. If no response is received before the timeout expires, the request fails and returns an error. Defaults to `1m`. See the Elasticsearch time units reference
